text: No mom. You believe what you want. I know the truth. Youâ€™ve believed what you wanted to for years. Itâ€™s tore us both up. I think itâ€™s best and it sucks cuz Iâ€™m your daughter that me and you donâ€™t have a relationship. The fact that I have to fight for my mom when it comes to man is insane. I canâ€™t wait to have kids mom and itâ€™s sad that you just want me to have kids to experience the pain you caused yourself. Because you canâ€™t accept the fact you have horrible taste in men. Youâ€™re still not even divorced which is the funniest part. You never even filed for divorceğŸ˜‚I didnâ€™t even want to call him dad bro you made me because my bothers were. I didnâ€™t like him to begin with. You forced me to like him. And be around him. You promised me when Shane left it was just gonna be me you and the boys. Then you met him not too long after. You changed when you met him. You got lenient because he broke your guard down. You picked you out like nothing. Picture thisâ€¦ a 35 year old man, single, living alone. Did you never stop and ask. Why is he 35 and single? No. He had all those skills and was such a good guy what could possibly be wrong???? You were a single broken mother with 3 children under the ages of 15. A daughter who was pre-pubescent. You donâ€™t think that screams Help me????? To a MAN. Men are the worst monsters out there. Then guess what. I turned 9, 10, and 11 during those years he was building trust and and gaining trust of those around us. Then when I was 12 guess what? I started my period and things started getting my twisted. You act like he just stuck his dick in me. No he took advantage of me everyone around him. He looked at my body one day and said â€œyou have to many stretch marksâ€. He made the coconut oil and aloe Vera concoction and told me how to put it on. He said â€œyou have to be nakedâ€. I walked into the bathroom and went to put it on and he waâ€. After came the tanning oil because I was going to California. I asked you to and idk what the reason was but you didnâ€™t do it he did. And you were okay with it. What you werenâ€™t ok with was after when you found out I was naked? wtf do you think mom. I asked you to do it for a reason. Youâ€™re a grown ass woman you know how tans work. The whole shower thing beats the fuck outta me because he was the one getting into showers with me then telling me to get into showers with him to wash his back. I canâ€™t wait for you to grow up mom and see what the fuck you did by always being gone
